name: Meditation
description: A practice that involves focusing or clearing your mind using a combination of mental and physical techniques.

name: Therapy
description: treatment intended to relieve or heal an injury or disorder

name: Spending time with loved ones
description: take time to embrace the ones that you are closest to

name: Reading
description: take time for yourself and get lost in the pages of a good book

name: Proper Hydration
description: Making sure your body has all the fluids it needs to function properly 15.5 cups per day for Men and 11.5 cups per day for women

name: Proper sleep
description: Experts recommend you sleep between 7-9 hours a night

name: Eating Clean
description: A clean diet may include whole fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, whole grains, and healthy fats while limiting highly processed snacks and other packaged foods with added sugar and salt.

name: Engaging in physical activity
description: Any bodily movement that is produced by the contraction of skeletal muscle and that substantially increases energy expenditure.

name: Stretching
description: is a form of physical exercise in which a specific muscle or tendon (or muscle group) is deliberately flexed or stretched in order to improve the muscle's felt elasticity and achieve comfortable muscle tone.
